Statements.Name: Lifestyle
Statements.Statement: Suitable for Sufferers of Lactose Intolerance

ItemTypeGroup.Memo: Factual information about the product which doesn't have its own field, this includes GDA Information / recycling etc. Example - Per bar Calories 123 6% GDA* *GDA = Guideline Daily Amount for an adult based on an average daily diet of 2000 kcal. The nutritional needs of individuals may be higher or lower, based on gender, age, level of physical activity and other factors.

NameValueText.Name: Cooking Instructions
NameValueText.Text: General Information explaining how the product should be cooked Example - For best results cook from frozen.

NameValueText.Name: Oven cook
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Oven from Ambient Example - Pre-heat the oven. 200°C / 400°F / Gas 6 12-14 mins.

NameValueText.Name: Oven cook
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Oven from Chilled Example - Pre-heat the oven. 200°C / 400°F / Gas 6 12-14 mins.

NameValueText.Name: Oven cook
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Oven from Frozen Example - Pre-heat the oven. 200°C / 400°F / Gas 6 22-24 mins.

NameValueText.Name: Microwave
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Microwave from Ambient Example - Empty contents into a microwaveable container and cover. Heat on full power for 1 1/2 minutes. Stir, then heat for a further 1 minute.

NameValueText.Name: Microwave
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Microwave from Chilled Example - Empty contents into a microwaveable container and cover. Heat on full power for 1 1/2 minutes. Stir, then heat for a further 1 minute.

NameValueText.Name: Microwave
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Microwave from Frozen Example - Empty contents into a microwaveable container and cover. Heat on full power for 1 1/2 minutes. Stir, then heat for a further 1 minute.

NameValueText.Name: Grill
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Grill from Frozen Example - Place under grill on a medium heat for 10-12 minutes, turning burger during cooking.

NameValueText.Name: Grill
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Grill from Ambient Example - Place under grill on a medium heat for 10-12 minutes, turning burger during cooking.

NameValueText.Name: Grill
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in the Grill from Chilled Example - Place under grill on a medium heat for 10-12 minutes, turning burger during cooking.

NameValueText.Name: Barbecue
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked on the BBQ from Frozen Example - Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Remove all packaging. Place burger on barbecue and cook on a medium heat for approximately 10 minutes turning burger frequently to prevent burning.

NameValueText.Name: Barbecue
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked on the BBQ from Ambient Example - Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Remove all packaging. Place burger on barbecue and cook on a medium heat for approximately 10 minutes turning burger frequently to prevent burning.

NameValueText.Name: Barbecue
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked on the BBQ from Chilled Example - Always wait for the flames to die down and the coals to turn white before cooking. Remove all packaging. Place burger on barbecue and cook on a medium heat for approximately 10 minutes turning burger frequently to prevent burning.

NameValueText.Name: Shallow Fry
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in a frying pan from Frozen Example - Remove all packaging. Add a little oil to a hot frying pan. Fry on a medium heat for 8-10 minutes, turning burger during cooking.

NameValueText.Name: Shallow Fry
NameValueText.Text: Information explaining how the product should be cooked in a frying pan from Ambient Example - Remove all packaging. Add a little oil to a hot frying pan. Fry on a medium heat for 8-10 minutes, turning burger during cooking.

NameValueText.Name: Deep Fry

LongTextItems.Name: Box Contents
LongTextItems.Text: Field that allows us to capture the contents of a product with various different components (as opposed to a multipack with several identical units)

ItemTypeGroup.Memo: Information about how not to use the product / general safety guidelines / standard warnings (e.g. IRRITANT) Example - Extremely Flammable

NameText.Name: Tasting Notes
NameText.Text: A lively vibrant red with juicy flavours of plums and red berry fruit

NameText.Name: Vinification Details
NameText.Text: Each grape variety is vinified separately with the aim to extract its individual character and aromas. Fermentation is at a high temperature of between 28-30°c and the grape skin cap is pumped over twice a day in order to maximise the extraction of the different components. 35% of the blend is matured in oak barrels for 8 months in order to provide rich aromas, balance and structure. Older barrels of 2-3 years were chosen over newer oak to soften tannins.

NameText.Name: History
NameText.Text: Gabriel Meffre is based in Gigondas in the heart of the Rhône Valley. One of the largest negociants in the Rhône, it buys in wine from around the region, as well as from its own estates, and is well-known in both France and export markets as a source of quality wines. In recent years, Gabriel Meffre has successfully developed La Châsse range of wines from the Rhône Valley and neighbouring Languedoc.

NameText.Name: Regional Information
NameText.Text: A true classic French wine that is one of the best selling brands in the UK. The wine is carefully selected from some of the best terroirs of the Côtes du Rhône appellation. The winemaking team blend the various wines to deliver a consistent wine that communicates the wonderful character and typicity of the region.

NameValue.Name: Storage Type
NameValue.Value: This wine is ideal for drinking now but can be kept for up to <>

LongTextItems.Name: Ingredients
LongTextItems.Text: Milk Chocolate 31.5% (Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Cocoa Mass, Skimmed Milk Powder, Concentrated Butter, Emulsifier: Lecithins (Soya); Vanillin)
Chocolate (Sugar, Cocoa Mass, Cocoa Butter, Emulsifier: Lecithins (Soya), Vanillin)
Raising Agents (Sodium Hydrogen Carbonate, Ammonium Carbonate)
